Text: great video man excellent upload to. quality is perfect!

I've watched this video 5 times now. I own a sportbike & have incorporated Code's techniques & pointers into my riding style. I'm now more aware of threats while riding & how to handle those situations and gaining confidence in my turning ablility. Look out twisties! Ill seed this for a year.

I downloaded this and it plays in Windows media player as audio. Any ideas why?

@norlando18 
Codecs... 

Try downloading and installing CCCP (combined community codec pack) 

or K-Lite Codec pack. 
There are others as well, I use CCCP. 
Careful on their sites, some dead links and some do not lead to the content... 

http://cccp.intternet.nl/Combined-Community-Codec-Pack-2011-11-11.exe
